page.title: 15GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: AT SCHOOL WE PLAY LOTS OF GAMES, ESPECIALLY BALL GAMES. HERE IS A LIST OF MY FAVOURITE GAMES - NETBALL, ROUNDERS, NON-STOP CRICKET, HOCKEY AND DANISH ROUNDERS. OUR SCHOOL IS A BIT OVER-CROWDED SO P4 - P7 GO BY MINI-BUS TO WEST LINTON SCHOOL EVERY WEDNESDAY FOR A GYM PERIOD. WE PLAY GAMES LIKE ROUNDERS AND NETBALL. THE BOYS PLAY FOOTBALL ON THE PITCH AT THE BOTTOM OF THE HILL. LAST YEAR WE HAD SWIMMING LESSONS AT THE NEW POOL AT PEEBLES. THIS YEAR WE HAD 2 GROUPS GOING TO CASTLEGRAIG POOL EVERY FRIDAY. SWIMMING IS GOOD FUN AND WE ARE TAUGHT LOTS OF DIFFERENT STOKES. WE WORK HARD FOR CERTIFICATES AND BADGES, BUT WE ARE ALLOWED FREE TIME TOO, TO PLAY WITH OUR FRIENDS. SOMETIMES WE HAVE ACTIVITY AFTERNOONS WITH OTHER SCHOOLS AND TAKE IN THE ANNUAL SPORTS AT PEEBLES, WEST LINTON AND NEWLANDS.
